definition: France/French/abbr. for 法國|法国[Fa3 guo2]/Taiwan pr. [Fa4]
law/method/way/to emulate/(Buddhism) dharma/(abbr. for 法家[Fa3 jia1]) the Legalists/(physics) farad (abbr. for 法拉[fa3 la1])
to pull/to play (a bowed instrument)/to drag/to draw/to chat

sentences.english: As for the lack of overtaking, the Ferrari man had no miracle solution.
sentences.chinese: 至于缺乏超车，这位法拉利车手没有什么好的办法。

sentences.english: The Rossoneri's club will try to emulate in Japan the feat of the Cavallino.
sentences.chinese: 红黑军团也将在日本仿效法拉利一样获得成功。

sentences.english: Signing up with Ferrari meant rebuilding my self-confidence in my own potential.
sentences.chinese: 和法拉利签约意味着在我的潜能中重塑自信。

sentences.english: He pointed to a bright red sleekly gleaming Ferrari in the parking lot.
sentences.chinese: 他指着停车场上闪亮的，线条优美的红色法拉利说道。

sentences.english: But he confessed to being shocked at the break-neck pace of games in the Premier League.
sentences.chinese: 这里的比赛速度都是法拉利的速度。

sentences.english: I sold my Ferrari and invested in college funds.
sentences.chinese: 我卖掉了我的法拉利，投资了大学基金。

sentences.english: It's powered by a Ferrari V12 engine.
sentences.chinese: 法拉利V12发动机给它提供动力。

sentences.english: When I joined Ferrari the whole team was so devoted to Gilles.
sentences.chinese: 我加入法拉利时整支车队都是如此忠于吉尔。

sentences.english: He said shoppers bought an average of four Ferraris a month from their cellphones.
sentences.chinese: 他还说消费者平均每个月通过手机购买四部法拉利。

sentences.english: How many has he got? "Oh, I've had my Ferraris and my Porsches."
sentences.chinese: 哦，我曾经买过法拉利和保时捷。

sentences.english: I will drive at Hockenheim the first time for Ferrari.
sentences.chinese: 这是我第一次代表法拉利来到霍根海姆。

sentences.english: Life-sized chocolate model of a Ferrari Formula 1 car has been created in Italy.
sentences.chinese: 由巧克力做成的仿真比例的法拉利F1赛车。

sentences.english: I am expecting the Red Bulls to be really tough and Ferrari.
sentences.chinese: 我想红牛跟法拉利会是个麻烦。

sentences.english: And when you get an Italian driver in a Ferrari?
sentences.chinese: 那什么时候能弄来一位意大利车手来法拉利？

sentences.english: Ferrari have introduced a new aero package for the F10 in Melbourne.
sentences.chinese: 法拉利在墨尔本使用了新的空气动力学套件。

definition: supercar/abbr. to 超跑|超跑[chao1 pao3]
racing bicycle/sporting bicycle/sports car/logging truck/on the job (of a train conductor)
supercar/abbr. for 超級跑車|超级跑车[chao1 ji2 pao3 che1]

pinyin: A1 er3 fa3 · Luo2 mi4 ou1
